All you need to know

Drop us a line

OMG really, is shipping just $1?

Yep, just $1 nationwide.

When will my order ship?

Your order will ship a week before the 1st of the month. If you place your order after this ship date, you’ll receive your first delivery the following month.

When will I receive my package?

Your Peachy package will be lovingly delivered to your door on or before the 1st of each month.

It’s the 1st of the month and my package is not here. What’s the deal?

We’re sorry you haven’t received it yet! First, check you mailbox and make sure that there isn’t a failed delivery slip in there. Sometimes, if you’re not home or if your building does not accept packages, the Postal Service will leave you a note saying they tried to deliver it but couldn’t. You need to either reschedule your delivery with them, or pick up your package at your Post Office. Unfortunately, there is nothing we can do about this... If there is no failed delivery slip, shoot us an email at wtf@bepeachy.com, and we’ll figure out what happened and totally make it up to you.

Where does Peachy ship?

We currently only ship within the US, but we are working our butts off to get Peachy to other countries.

I’m going on vacation. Can I get my package delivered to where I’m going?

If you’re going somewhere within the US, then the answer is a definite yes! Just make sure you log into your account and change your address at least 7 days before the 1st of the month. Also, remember to change the address again once you come back from your relaxing getaway. If you’re going out of the country, you can suspend your deliveries by logging into your account. You will not be charged for the months you’re abroad.

I need to change my address, billing info, brand, or flow mix.

No problemo! You can change your information at any time by logging into your account. Keep in mind that changes need to be made 7 days before the 1st of the month in order to apply to that month’s delivery.

When will Peachy bill me?

We will charge your account 7 days before the 1st of the month. Your subscription payment should appear on your statement as Be Peachy LLC.
